mapper.insert: INSERT INTO phone(id, create_date_time,update_date_time, sku, price, goods_name, goods_commit, shop_name, other, goods_detail_url, source) VALUES (#{id}, #{createDateTime}, #{updateDateTime}, #{sku}, #{price}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsCommit}, #{shopName}, #{other}, #{goodsDetailUrl}, #{source})
mapper.select:
select count(*) from phone
and sku=#{sku}
mapper.update: update phone set price=#{price}, goods_name=#{goodsName}, goods_commit=#{goodsCommit}, shop_name=#{shopName}, other=#{other}, goods_detail_url=#{goodsDetailUrl}, source=#{source}, update_date_time=#{updateDateTime} where sku=#{sku}
